name: Joshua Eghelshi
bio: My name is Joshua Eghelshi, a Software Engineer and Proud father of a very active 4 year old. I am passionate in what I do and have a feverish drive to always look for creative solutions when faced with a challenge. Wether it be making easy to use and modern websites to verastile scaling backends. I always try and do my best to make sure the client's vision is fullfilled and most important of all the consumer has a seemless experiance.
